SYSTEM: PresntacionMLF-vFinal.pdf: Página 25
Initial and Future Work with the Easy-to-Read Methodology 
 
 
Summary 
 
 
 
E2R Methodology helps to provide people with cognitive 
disabilities access to knowledge and information in equal 
conditions than average people 
Having (semi-) automatic tools that support the 
adaptation of materials to the E2R Methodology 
improves the daily life of people with cognitive 
disabilities  
 
39
speaker: SYSTEM
